## Meeting.default.updateVideo() method

Update the main video track with new parameters

NOTE: this method can only be used with transcoded meetings, for multistream meetings use publishTrack()

**Signature:**

```typescript
updateVideo(options: {
        sendVideo: boolean;
        receiveVideo: boolean;
        stream: MediaStream;
    }): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { sendVideo: boolean; receiveVideo: boolean; stream: MediaStream; } |  |

**Returns:**

any
